title: Release of polychlorinated biphenyls (PCBs) and organochlorine pesticides (OCPs) from cigarette butts into the aquatic environment: Levels and ecotoxicity
content:
Publication date: 30 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 20

Author(s): Hossein Arfaeinia, Mohammad Reza Masjedi, Rasoul Asgariyan, Farshid Soleimani, Vali Alipour, Sara Dadipoor, Reza Saeedi, Anis Jahantigh, Ammar Maryamabadi
